article_title: Country Singer on ESPN -- Jerry Jones & Chris Christie Are Gay Lovers
article_text:
TMZ Sports

Big Shaq got TURNT ALL THE WAY UP at a rap show in Oklahoma City -- getting onstage and headbanging along ... while a jacked muscle dude joined the gang and started flexing on the NBA…

twitter.description: GLAAD is probably gonna have a thing or two to say about this one ...Because a big country music star just took a cheap shot at Dallas Cowboys owner Jerry…
